entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
